block.name: FDR
block.doc: Copyright 2018 Michel Barbeau, Carleton University. Using in input a PDU containing "fl" samples, constructs a frequency domain representation. Produces a PDU contained the frequency domain representation and indices of signal tracking functions. Parameters fs = Sampling frequency (in samples/second). fl = Data frame length (in samples). spd = Number of samples in a baud (in symbols). maxdrift = Mmaximum acceptable linear frequency drift during a data frame (in Hz). To disable linear frequency drift search set this parameter to null. maxfreqs = Mmaximum number of frequencies consider during the search. halfbandwidth = Half pass bandwidth (in Hz). In very noisy conditions, make it narrow but not less than 5 Hz. cf = Carrier frequency (in Hz) used to calculate the nonlinear Doppler shift, normally use the center frequency. threshold = Nonlinear vs linear power ratio required for nonlinear model to be appled. To disable the nonlinear search, set this paramater to a very high value, e.g., 100.
